quotes.quote: The victorious Christian neither exalts nor downgrades himself. His interests have shifted from self to Christ.
Bias has to be taught. If you hear your parents downgrading women or people of different backgrounds, why, you are going to do that.
Don't downgrade your dream to match your reality. Upgrade your faith to match your destiny.
A churchless community, a community where men have abandoned and scoffed at or ignored their religious needs, is a community on the rapid downgrade.
People degrade themselves in order to make machines seem smart all the time.
As the rich consume more and more, they are clearly not going to want to downgrade their own status.
When men are full of envy they disparage everything, whether it be good or bad.
Don't downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny.
Every so often you have to increase your profile so you can let it lower again, like a balloon.
To downgrade the human mind is bad theology.
Raise your standards and you will rise along with them.
Resolve never to criticize or downgrade yourself, but instead rejoice that you are fearfully and wonderfully made.
Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
Don't degrade your soul to the extent of believing in curses. No man can curse you except your maker.
The lower you fall, the higher you'll fly.

When you denigrate people, they have two ways to fight back - with their fists and guns, or their mouths. And mouths are seemingly the easiest way to not get hit back. If people are laughing, they're not going to hit you.
They make only progress. Instead of revenge, self progress is more safe to downgrade others including enemy.
Sometimes people with low self-esteem will try to punish you for caring about them.
Everybody needs to lower his ego.
